knimeNode.name: Binary Objects to PNGs
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the binary objects of a column to PNGs.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts the binary object cells to PNG cells.
fullDescription.option:
Append
Does append the new column to the table.
Replace
Does replace the selected column with the new column.

ports.inPort: Table that contains the binary objects that will be converted.
ports.outPort: Input table with PNG column either appended or replacing the binary objects.
